title: [GAMEPLAY] Spirit Guard Udyr STILL bugged after the "fix". This time it's MAJOR sound issues.
body:
How to reproduce:

Step 1) Get phoenix stance to maximum rank by levelling up

Step 2) Die while in phoenix stance

Step 3) Respawn

Step 4) Now EVERY stance will make the phoenix noise upon activation.

Step 5) To fix the bug, die while in another stance. But if you die in pheonix stance again, it will happen again.

Something that is probably not relevant, but that I should mention anyway (in case a programmer with a different playstyle than me can't reproduce it): I always bear out of the base after respawning.

Another thing to note: I'm pretty sure I died in bear stance once, but still had the bugged "phoenix every stance" noise, which I'm mentioning in case it helps find an elusive piece of bugged code. I have also died other times in bear stance, and NOT had the bugged noise. It seems to reproduce 100% of the time if you die in max ranked phoenix stance though.

And, lastly: This DOES make the skin UNPLAYABLE. A lot of Udyr players rely heavily on sound cues to play the champion properly. I am personally not using this skin until it gets fixed (which also means I hope there is a service status announcement, so I can know when it is fixed, because it takes a long time to level up in a custom game just to see if my skin is working properly)

Please fix ASAP. I haven't been able to use my $30 skin in a long time now :(.

Also relevant, are other stances doing the same thing? I haven't tested it. See below for relevant forum posts:

>**Vacus:**
> *"One other thing that's worth testing is if this happens with other stances.  If you die while in max rank tiger, for example, does every stance make the tiger sound?  Or is it only phoenix?"*
>
>**UdyrWwYi Jg ONLY:**
> *"This is hard because phoenix is the loudest and most noticeable. For all I know, the phoenix bug is making BOTH stance noises (eg: phoenix and turtle) at the same time. But I can't hear the turtle because phoenix is fricken loud."*

My GD thread: http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/GD/UUW6MiBY-spirit-guard-udyr-skin-broken-again-after-the-new-fix-need-help-reproducing-consistently-gd



http://img1.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20130628134800/leagueoflegends/images/b/b4/Udyr_SpiritGuardSkin.jpg

EDIT: Can confirm that this is happening with other max rank stances. I died in max rank turtle style, and then every stance made the shield echo noise, along with their regular sound (so its doing double sound effects every stance while active, with phoenix being the most obnoxious when it triggers the bug, because it's the loudest)

What's the latest on this bug? I am still getting the turtle shield echo when I die in Turtle Stance playing as SGU.

Heyo! 

We believe we found the cause of the issue and are trying it out to ensure it doesn't break a sound hook up somewhere else. (Ultimate skins are uh.. special snowflakes). You won't see a fix in for Patch 5.12, since that's happening really soon, but we're currentrly aiming for the patch afterwards. :]
